attributes.action: kick jade goody out of the celebrity big brother house!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: jade goody needs to be removed from the big brother house, she is causing major conflict within the house and in the outside world too. ofcom have recieved 27000 complaints from viewers regarding her behavour, ignorance and racist comments which are causing many issues not only in the uk but in india too!! with large protests which can be seen internationally on the news!!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
